message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a fantastic price of $12,000. I believe it will be very beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,000 is too low. How about $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
